juzs.text: 67|1|Taiken o shōaku nasa reru kata ni shukufuku are. Hontōni kare wa subete no koto ni zen'nō de ara reru.
67|2|(Kare wa) shi to nama o tsukura reta katadearu. Sore wa, anata gata no naka dare no okonai ga sugurete iru no ka o kokoromi rareru tame de, kare wa iryoku narabinaku kan'yōde ara reru.

67|3|(Kare wa) issō issō ni, 7 ten o tsukura reru okata. Jihi amaneku okata no sōzō ni wa, sukoshi no fuchōwa mo nai koto o mirudearou. Sorede aratamete kansatsu shi nasai. Anata wa nani ka sakeme o miru no ka.
67|4|Sore de imaichido,-me o agete miruga ī. Anata no shisen wa,(nani no kekkan mo sagashidasezu) tada bon'yari shite moto ni modoru dakedearu.
67|5|Kare wa tōmyō (hoshi) o motte, sai kasō no ten o kazari, akuma-tachi ni taisuru haritsuke (ryūsei) to nashi, mata kare-ra no tame ni rekka no chōbatsu o junbi shita.
67|6|Kare-ra no omo o shinjinai mono ni wa, jigoku no chōbatsu ga aru. Nanto warui kaeri-shodearu koto yo.
67|7|Kare-ra ga sono naka ni nagekoma reru toki, sore (jigoku) ga futtō suru ka no yō ni bukimide ki shi ion de unaru no o kare-ra wa kikou.
67|8|Hageshī ikari no tame ni haretsu suru ka no yōdearu. Ichidan ga sono naka ni nagekoma reru tabi ni, soko no kanshu wa kare-ra ni,`anata gata ni, keikoku-sha wa yattekonakatta no ka.' To tou.

67|9|Kare-ra wa iu. `Sōdesu, tashikani hitori no keikoku-sha ga watashi-tachi no moto ni yattekimashita. Daga watashi-tachi wa kyohi shite itta. “Arrā wa nani (no keiji) mo kudasa renai. Anata gata wa, taihen'na kago no naka ni iru dakedearu.”'
67|10|Kare-ra wa nao iu. `Watashi-tachi ga kiki, jukukō shitanaraba, rekka no jūnin no nakaniha hairanakattadeshou ni.'
67|11|Kare-ra wa jibun no samazamana tsumi o mitometa. Rekka no jūnin wa,(yōsha kara) tōkuhanarete iru.
67|12|Hontōni menimienai-nushi o, osoreru mono ni wa, yōsha to idaina hōshō ga arou.
67|13|Anata gataga kotoba o kakushite ite mo, mata sore o arawashite mo, kare wa hontōni mune no naka no mono o shitte ora reru.
67|14|Kare ga sōzō sa reta mono o, shiranaidearou ka. Kare wa, shin'ō o rikai shi tsūgyō nasa reru.

67|15|Kare koso wa, daichi o anata gata ni tsukai yasuku nasa reta katadearu. Sorede sono sho chiiki o ōrai shi, kare no kate o taberuga yoi. Soshite fukkatsu no toki ni hakare ni mesa rete iku midearu.
67|16|Daichi ga yureugoku toki, ten ni imasu kata ga, anata gata o sore ni nomikoma se rarenaidearou to, anshin shite iru no ka.
67|17|Mata anata gata wa ten ni imasu kata ga,(saseki no) reppū o anata gata ni okura renaidearou to, anshin shite iru no ka. Yagate anata gata wa, waga keikoku ga ikaganaru mono ka o shirudearou.
67|18|Hontōni anata gata izen no mono-tachi mo,(waga keikoku o) usodearu to shita. Sorede waga fukyō ga ikaga ni (osoroshī monode) atta ka.

67|19|Kare-ra wa ue o tobutori ni tsuite kangaenai no ka. Tsubasa o hiroge, mata sore o tatamude wanai ka. Jihi amaneku okata no soto, dare ga sorera o sasaeru koto ga dekiyou. Hontōni kare wa, subete no koto o gozonji de ara reru.
67|20|Jihi amaneku okata o sashioite anata gata o tasukeru gunzei to nari eru mono wa, daredearu no ka. Fushin-sha wa, mōsō shite iru nisuginai.
67|21|Kare ga moshi o megumi o tome rareru to, anata gata ni megumi o nashi eru mono wa daredearu no ka. Iya kare-ra wa kōman to,(shinri kara no) kaihi ni koshūsuru.
67|22|Kao o fusete (tada katakuna ni) aruku mono to, tadashī michi no ue o kisokutadashiku aruku mono to, dochira ga yoku michibika reru no ka.
67|23|Gen tte yaru ga ī. `Kare koso wa anata gata o tsukuri, anata gata no tame ni, chōkaku, shikaku, kanjō (chiryoku) o atae rareta katadearu. Nanto anata gata no kansha no nen no usui koto yo.'
67|24|Itte yaru ga ī. `Kare koso wa, anata gata o chijō ni bunsan shi han'ei sa se rareta katadeari, anata gata wa kare no omoto ni atsume rareru.'
67|25|Kare-ra (fushin-sha) wa,`moshi anata gata no kotoba ga shinjitsunara, kono keiyaku wa nanji (hatasa reru no)dearou ka.' To iu.
67|26|Gen tte yaru ga ī. `Hontōni sore o shiru no wa, arrā dakedearu. Watashi wa kōmeina keikoku-sha nisuginai.'
67|27|Kare-ra ga me no hen ni sore o miru toki, fushin-sha-tachi no kao wa kanashimi ni kumoru. `Kore ga anata gata no motomete ita mono (yakusoku no jōju)dearu.' To tsuge rareru.

67|28|Gen tte yaru ga ī. `Anata gata wa kangaenai no ka, moshi arrā ga, watashi ya watashi to issho no mono o horobosa rete mo, mata jihi o atae rarete mo, oyoso fushin-sha o tsūretsuna chōbatsu kara sukuu mono wa daredearou ka.'

67|29|Itte yaru ga ī. `Kare wa jihi amaneku okata de arare, watashi-tachi wa kare o shinkō shi, kare ni (subetewo) takusu. Yagate anata gata wa, akirakana kago no naka ni iru mono ga daredearu no ka o shirudearou.'
67|30|Itte yaru ga ī. `Anata gata wa kangaenai no ka. Moshi aru asa, anata gata no mizu ga chika ni shizumi sattanaraba, waki deru mizu o, anata gata ni motaraseru mono wa, ittai daredearu no ka.'
68|1|Nūn. Fude ni chikai kete, mata kaita mono ni oite chikau.
68|2|Omo no onkei ni oite, anata wa kichigaide wanai.
68|3|Iya, hontōni anata ni wa, tsukinai hōshō ga arou.
68|4|Hontōni anata wa, sūkōna tokusei o sonaete iru.
68|5|Yagate anata wa miyou, kare-ra mo mata mirudearou.
68|6|Anata gata no dare ga kichigaidearu ka o.
68|7|Hontōni anata no omo wa,-dō kara mayoi satta mono o, mottomo yoku shitte ora re, mata michibika rete iru mono o mottomo yoku shiri tsukusa reru katadearu.
68|8|Sorede anata wa (shinri o) hinin suru mono ni shitagatte wa naranai.
68|9|Kare-ra no negai wa, anata ga ayumiyoru koto de, sō nareba kare-ra mo dakyō shitai nodearu.
68|10|Anata wa, hiretsuna chikai o tateru don'na mono ni mo kutsujū shite wa naranai.
68|11|Chūshō shi, waruguchi o ii aruku mono,
68|12|zenji o samatage, okite ni somuku tsumibukaimono,
68|13|ranbō (zangyaku)na-sha, sono soto sujō no iyashī-sha,
68|14|tomi to (ōku no) shijo o motte iru tame ni (sōdearu, korera no mono ni shitagatte wa naranai).
68|15|Kare ni waga shirushi ga Satoru 唱 Sa reru to,`sore wa mukashi no monogataridesu.' To iu.
68|16|Yagate ware wa, hana no ue ni yakiin o osudearou.
68|17|Hontōni ware wa,(kaju)-en no mochinushi o kokoromita yō ni, kare-ra o kokoromita. Kare-ra ga, sōchō ni sore (kudamono) o shūkaku suru koto o chikatta toki ni,
68|18|(arrā no o nozominaraba) to, jōken o tsukeru koto o shinakatta.
68|19|Sore de kare-ra ga nemutte iru ma ni, anata no nushi kara no tenbatsu ga sore o osotta.
68|20|Sorede asa ni wa, sore wa tsumitora reta yō ni natta.
68|21|Sōchō kare-ra wa tagaini sakenda.
68|22|`Moshi shūkaku suru nonara anata gata no hata ni isogimashou.'
68|23|Sokode kare-ra wa tei koe ni sasayaki atte dekaketa.
68|24|`Kyō wa hitori no binbōnin mo, ano (kaju-en) ni haira sete wa narimasen.'
68|25|Kare-ra wa tsuyoku kokoro ni kimete, asa hayaku deteitta.
68|26|Daga kare-ra ga sore o mita toki, itta. `Watashi-tachi wa, michi o machigaete iru.
68|27|Iya, watashi-tachi wa (shūkaku-mono o) ubawareta.'
68|28|Kare-ra no naka, sukoshi odayakana hitori ga itta. `Anata gata wa dōshite (omo o) tataenai no ka to, watashi ga itta no ni.'
68|29|Kare-ra wa,`watashi-tachi no omo o tataeru. Hontōni watashi-tachi wa fugidearimashita.' To itta.
68|30|Soko de kare-ra wa, tagaini semeai hajimeta.
68|31|Kare-ra wa itta. `Ā kanashī, watashi-tachi wa hontōni ōheideshita.
68|32|Omo wa kore ni kawaru, sara ni yoi (kaju-en) o atae rareru kamo shirenai. Hontōni watashi-tachi wa,(kaigo shite) omo ni tangan shimasu.'
68|33|Kono yōna mono ga,(gense no) chōbatsudearu. Daga raise no chōbatsu wa sarani ōkina monodearu. Moshi kare-ra ni wakatte itanaraba.
68|34|Hontōni arrā o osoreru mono ni taishite wa,-nushi no omoto ni ki kobi no rakuen ga arou.
68|35|Ware wa shinjinbukai-sha-tachi o, tsumibito no yō ni atsukau to demo iu no ka.
68|36|Anata gata wa dō shita no ka. Anata gata wa dō handan suru no ka.
68|37|Soretomo anata gata ni wa, manabu ni tariru Keisuke ga aru no ka.
68|38|Anata gata ga erabu mono wa, nani demo sono Keisuke no naka ni aru no ka.
68|39|Soretomo anata gata wa, shinpan no hi made yūkōna seiyaku o wareto musunda no ka. Anata gataga shiryobunbetsu suru koto wa, tashikani anata gata no mono ni naru no ka.
68|40|(Muhanmado yo) kare-ra ni toe. `Kare-ra no dare ga sore o hoshō suru nodesu ka.'
68|41|Matawa, kare-ra wa (omoni) haisuru mono ga aru no ka. Kare-ra ga tadashī nonara, sono haisuru mono o tsurete kitasa se nasai.
68|42|Sune ga, gen wa ni sa reru hi (o omoi nasai). Kare-ra wa sajida suru yō motome rareru. Daga kare-ra ni wa dekinaidearou.
68|43|Kare-ra wa me o fuse, kutsujoku o kōmurudearou. Sajida suru yō, tashika ni kare-ra wa yobikake rarete ita. Sonotoki gotai manzokunanoni (kyohi shita).
68|44|Sokode kono o kotoba (kuruān) o kyogidearu to suru mono o ware ni makase yo. Ware wa kare-ra ga kidzukanai hōmen kara, ippo ichiichi (daraku ni) michibiki,
68|45|kare-ra o yūyo surudearou. Hontōni ware no keiryaku wa tsuyoku tashikadearu.
68|46|Soretomo anata ga kare-ra ni hōshū o motome, sore de kare-ra wa futan o kase rareta no ka.
68|47|Mata yūgen-kai ga kare-ra no temoto ni ari, sore de kare-ra wa (sore o) kakikudasu koto ga dekiru no ka.
68|48|Dakara nintai shite, anata no omo no meirei o mate. Sakana no tomo no yōdeatte wa naranai. Kurushi-sa no amari (kare ga) sakenda toki (no yō ni).
68|49|-Nushi kara no onkei ga kare ni tasshinakattanaraba, kare wa tsumi o owasa re, fumenboku ni fumōnochi ni suteraretadearou.
68|50|Kono yō ni omo wa, kare o erabi seigi no to no hitori to nasa reta.
68|51|Fushinjin-sha wa keikoku o kiku toki, sono (monosugoi) metsuki de, anata o 凡 Ndo taoren bakari ni suru. Kare-ra wa iu. `Hontōni kare wa tsuka reta monodesu.'
68|52|Daga, kono (kuruān) koso wa, ban'yū no tame no kunkai nihokanaranai.
69|1|Tashikana shinjitsu,
69|2|tashikana shinjitsu to wa nani ka.
69|3|Tashikana shinjitsu ga nandearu ka o, anata ni rikai sa seru mono wa nani ka.
69|4|Samūdo to ādo (no min) wa, totsuzen kuru saiyaku o kyogidearu to shita.
69|5|Sore de samūdo wa raiun no arashi ni yotte horobosa reta.
69|6|Mata ādo wa unari kuruu kaze ni yotte horobosa reta.
69|7|Yoru 8-nichi ni watari, kare-ra ni taishi taema naku (arashi ga) osoi, sore de kuchita natsumeyashi no ki no yō ni,(subete no) min ga soko ni taorete iru no o, anata wa mitadearou.
69|8|Sorede anata wa, kare-ra no naka, dare ka nokotte iru mono o miru no ka.
69|9|Mata firuaun ya kare izen no mono ya horobosa reta sho toshi (no min) mo, tsumi o okashite ita.
69|10|Kare-ra wa omo no shito ni shitagawanainode, kare wa mōretsuna chōbatsu de kare-ra o shobatsu shita.
69|11|Ōmizu no toki, ware ga hakobune de anata gata o hakonda no wa,
69|12|sore o anata gata e no kyōkun to sa se, chūibukai mimi ga sore o (kii te) kioku ni todomeru tamedearu.
69|13|Sore de rappa ga ichi fuki fuka reta toki,
69|14|daichi ya yamayama wa mochiage rare, ichigeki de konagona ni kudaka re,
69|15|sonohi (ichidai) jiken ga okoru.
69|16|Mata ōzora wa chiji ni sakeru. Ten ga moroku yowai hidearou.
69|17|Tenshi-tachi wa, sono (ten no) hashibashi ni ori, sonohi, 8-ri (no tenshi) ga kare-ra no ue ni, anata no omo no gyokuza o ninaudearou.
69|18|Sonohi anata gata wa (shinpan no tame) mina 剝 Ki-dashi ni sa re nanihitotsu to shite kakushi ōsenaidearou.
69|19|Sore de migite ni sono (gyōjō)-ki o watasa reru mono wa iu. `Koko ni (kite), anata gata wa watashi no (gyōjō)-ki o yome.'
69|20|`Izure watashi (shinja) no seisan (shinpan) ni au koto ga, hontōni wakatte ita.'
69|21|Kōshite kare wa shifukuna seikatsu ni hitari,
69|22|takai (oka no)-en no naka de,
69|23|samazamana kajitsu ga tedjika ni aru.
69|24|`Anata gata wa, sugisatta hi (gense) de okonatta (zenkō no) tame ni, man'etsu shite tabe, katsu nome.'(To iwa reyou)
69|25|daga hidarite ni sono (gyōjō)-ki o watasa reru mono wa iu. `Ā , watashi no (gyōjō)-ki ga watasa renakattanaraba.'
69|26|`Watashi wa jibun no seisan ga, don'na monodearu ka o shiranakatta.'
69|27|Ā, sono (shi) ga,(watashi no) shūmatsudeattanaraba,
69|28|tomi wa, watashi ni yakudatanakatta.
69|29|`Ken'i wa, watashi katara kieusete shimatta.'
69|30|(Daga genmei ga kudarou. ) `Kare o toraete, shibare.'
69|31|Sore kara moesakaru hi de, kare o yake.
69|32|Sarani 70 wanshaku no naga-sa no kusari de., Kare o make.
69|33|Hontōni kare wa, idainaru arrā o shinjizu,
69|34|mata hinja o yashinau koto o susumenakatta.
69|35|Sorede kono hi kare wa, soko ni tomo wa naku,
69|36|mata, kegarawashī fuhai-mono no soto ni shokumotsu wanai,
69|37|`sore o taberu no wa, tsumibito dakedearu.'
69|38|Ware wa, anata gataga mi eru mono ni oite chikai,
69|39|mata anata gataga mi enai mono ni oite chikau.
69|40|Hontōni kore wa, sonkina shito no kotobadearu.
69|41|Kore wa shijin no kotobade wanai. Daga anata gata wa, hotondo shinjinai.
69|42|Mata, uranaishi no kotoba demonai. Shikashi anata gata wa hotondo ki ni moshi nai.
69|43|(Koreha) ban'yū no nushi kara kudasa reta keijidearu.
69|44|Moshi kare (shito) ga, ware ni kanshite nanrakano kotoba o netsuzō surunaraba,
69|45|ware wa kitto kare no migite o torae,
69|46|kare no keidōmyaku o kanarazu kirudearou.
69|47|Anata gata no naka, darehitori, kare o mamotte yarenai nodearu.
69|48|Hontōni kore wa,-nushi o osoreru mono e no kunkaidearu.
69|49|Ware wa anata gata no naka,(sore o) kyohi suru mono o shiru.
69|50|Hontōni kono (kuruān) wa, fushin-sha ni totte wa kanashimi (no tane)dearou.
69|51|Daga sore wa, hontōni kakkotaru fudō no shinridearu.
69|52|Dakara shidainaru okata, anata no omo no gyomei o tatae nasai.
70|1|Aru mono ga, kudarubeki chōbatsu ni tsuite tou.
70|2|Fushinjin-sha wa, sore o fusegu koto wa dekinai.
70|3|Kaidan no shu, arrā kara (no chōbatsu)dearu.
70|4|Tenshi-tachi ya seirei (dai tenshi jiburīru) wa, tsuitachi ni shite, kare no moto ni noboru, sono (tsuitachi no) naga-sa wa, 5 man-nendearu.
70|5|Dakara anata wa, rippa ni taeshinobe.
70|6|Hontōni kare-ra wa, sore (Ni~Tsu) o tōi to omou.
70|7|Shikashi ware wa, sore o chikai to miru.
70|8|Ten ga toketa dō no yō ni naru hi,
70|9|yamayama wa, suita yōmō no yō ni nari,
70|10|dare mo tomo (no anpi) o tou koto wanai.
70|11|Kare-ra wa tagaini kao o awaseru koto ga dekinai hodo osoreru. Tsumi aru mono wa sonohi, jibun no tsumiwoaganau tame ni jibun no kodomo-tachi o sashidasou to negaudearou.
70|12|Kare no tsuma ya kyōdai,
70|13|kare o kabatta kinshin,
70|14|jibun o sukuerunaraba, chijō no subete no mono o agete aganau koto o koi negaudearou.
70|15|Danjite dekinai. Hontōni kano (jigoku no) honō wa,
70|16|atama no kawa made ken gi toru.
70|17|(Seigi ni) se o misete, somuki satta-sha o shōkan surudearou.
70|18|Mata chikuseki shi, intoku no kin o motsu mono o mo.
70|19|Ningen wa hontōni sewashinaku tsukura rete iru.
70|20|Saiyaku ni aeba nageki kanashimi,
70|21|kōun ni aeba monooshimi ni naru.
70|22|Daga reihai ni shōjin suru mono wa,-sōde wanai.
70|23|Reihai o genshu shite iru mono,
70|24|mata kare-ra no tomi ga, kōseidearu to mitome rarete iru mono,
70|25|monogoi suru mono ya taibō suru mono no tame ni (hodokosu mono),
70|26|mata shinpan no hi no shinjitsu o kakunin shite iru mono,
70|27|mata kare-ra no omo no chōbatsu o osoreru mono mo.
70|28|Hontōni omo no chōbatsu kara, anzendearu to kangaerubekide wanai.
70|29|Mata kakureta tokoro (teisetsu) o mamoru mono,
70|30|kare-ra no tsuma ya migite no shoyū suru mono ni kagitte iru baai wa betsu de,-zai ni wa naranai.
70|31|Shikashi kore igai ni motomeru mono wa hō o koeta monodearu.
70|32|Futaku sa reta koto ya yakusoku ni chūjitsuna-sha,
70|33|shōgen ni kōseina-sha,
70|34|mata reihai o genshu suru mono.
70|35|Korera no mono wa eiyo o ete rakuen no naka ni (sumu).
70|36|Ima fushinjin-sha-tachi ga, anata no kata ni isoide iru no wa nanigoto ka.
70|37|Migi kara mata hidarikara,-gun ni natte.
70|38|Kare-ra wa mina shifuku no rakuen ni hairu koto o nozomu no ka.
70|39|Iya, danjite dekinai kotodearu. Hontōni ware wa, kare-ra ga shiru mono kara, kare-ra o tsukutta nodearu.
70|40|Iya, ware wa azuma to nishi no omo ni yotte chikau. Ware ni totte wa kanōdearu.
70|41|Kare-ra yori mo sugureta (soto no)-sha o motte, kare-ra ni kaete yarou. Ware wa, shippai suru koto wa nai nodearu.
70|42|Dakara anata wa, kare-ra o (kyoei ni) hitara se, tawamure ni makaseruga yoi. Kare-ra ga yakusoku sa rete iru, sonohi no kaiken made.
70|43|Kare-ra ga haka kara awatadashiku detekuru-bi. Sore wa marude (gense de) kare-ra ga gūzō kami e to isoida yō ni.
70|44|Kare-ra wa me o fuse, kutsujoku o kōmurudearou. Kore ga kare-ra ni yakusoku sa rete ita, sonohidearu.
71|1|Hontōni ware wa, nūfu o sono min ni tsukawashi,`itamashī chōbatsu ga anata no min ni kudaru mae ni, anata wa, kare-ra ni keikoku shi nasai.'(To meijita).
71|2|Kare wa itta. `Watashi no hitobito yo, watashi wa anata gata e no kōmeina 1-ri no keikoku-shadesu.
71|3|Anata gata wa arrā ni tsukae, kare o osore, watashi ni shitagai nasai.

71|4|Kare wa anata gata no samazamana tsumi o yurushi, sadame rareta kigen made, anata gata o yūyo nasa remasu. Hontōni arrā no kigen ga kita toki wa, yūyo sa remasen. Moshi anata gata ga wakatte itanaraba.'
71|5|Kare (nūfu) wa mōshiageta. `Omo yo, watashi wa yoru mo hiru mo, watashi no hitobito ni yobikakemashita.
71|6|Daga, watashi no yobikake wa, tada (seidō kara no) tōhi o masu bakaridesu.

71|7|Watashi ga kare-ra ni,“kare ga, anata gata o o yurushi ni naru noda” to yobikakeru toki, kare-ra wa yubi o jibun no mimi ni sashikomi, jibun de gaitō o kōmutte (fushinjin o) koshū shi, hitasura kōman ni narimasu.
71|8|Sorede watashi wa,-goe o ōkiku shite kare-ra ni yobikakemashita.
71|9|Arutoki wa kō ni, mata (arutoki wa) hisoka ni kare-ra ni (uttaete),
71|10|watashi wa iimashita. “Anata gata no omo no o yurushi o negae. Hontōni kare wa, tabitabi o yurushi nasa reru.
71|11|Kare wa, anata gata no ue ni yutaka ni ame o furase rare,
71|12|anata gata no zaisan ya shijo o fuyashi, mata anata gata no tame ni, samazamana en ya (mizu no nagareru) kasen o mōke rareru.
71|13|Anata gata wa dō shita no ka. Arrā no goshinsetsu, gamandzuyo-sa ni taishite, nozomi o motanai to wa.
71|14|Kare wa hontōni junjoyoku dankai o o tte anata gata o tsukura reta.
71|15|Anata gata wa, arrā ga 7 ten o ikaga ni issō mata issō to, tsukura reta ka o kangaete minakatta no ka.

77|4|Shinri to kyogi o kubetsu suru (kuruān no) keiji ni oi te.
77|5|Keiji o yogen-sha-tachi ni tsutaeru tenshi-tachi ni oite (chikau).
77|6|Arrā kara no o satoshi to keikoku to shite (tsutaete iru).
77|7|(Makka no haishin-sha yo. ) Anata gata ni yakusoku sa reta koto (fukkatsu no hi to chōbatsu) ga tashika ni okoru.
77|8|Moroboshi ga kesa reru toki,
77|9|ten ga sake chiru toki,
77|10|yamayama ga chiri no yō ni hakobi sara reru toki,
77|11|shito-tachi ga sadame rareta toki ni shōshū sa reru toki,
77|12|(sorera wa) itsu no hi made yūyo sa reta no ka.
77|13|Sabaki no hi madedearu.
77|14|Sabaki no hi ga nandearu ka o, anata ni rikai sa seru mono wa nani ka.
77|15|(Shinri o) usodearu to itte kita-sha-tachi ni tori, sonohi koso awaredearu.
77|16|Ware wa (akugyō no tame ni) zendai no mono o horobosanakatta ka.
77|17|Sonogo ware wa, kōdai no mono ni kare-ra o tsuga setade wanai ka.
77|18|Kono yō ni ware wa tsumi no aru-sha-tachi o jobunsuru.
77|19|(Shinri o) usodearu to itte kita-sha-tachi ni tori, sonohi koso awaredearu.
77|20|Ware wa anata gata o iyashī mizu kara tsukuttade wanai ka.
77|21|Ware wa sore o, antaina yasumi-sho (shikyū) ni oita,
77|22|sadame rareta jiki made.
77|23|Ware wa sō sadameta. Waga kettei no nanto yoi koto yo.
77|24|(Shinri o) usodearu to itte kita-sha-tachi ni tori, sonohi koso awaredearu.
77|25|Ware wa, daichi o ōkina yōki to shinakatta ka,
77|26|seizon-sha to shisha (sōhō no tame ni).
77|27|Sono-jō ni yamayama o takaku sobie sase, mata Shin 鮮Na mizu o anata gata ni noma setade wanai ka.
77|28|(Shinri o) usodearu to itte kita-sha-tachi ni tori, sonohi koso awaredearu.
77|29|(Ōse rareyou. ) `Omomuke, anata gataga usodearu to itte kita tokoro (jigoku) e.
77|30|Omomuke, anata gata 3ttsu no eda (ni tachi noboru kemuri) no in ni.'
77|31|Soreha kage ni mo narazu, mata moesakaru honō ni taishite wa yakunitatanaidearou.
77|32|Soreha (kyodaina) toride no yōna honō o haki,
77|33|chōdo (kyōhon suru) kōkasshoku no rakuda no yō.
77|34|(Shinri o) usodearu to itte kita-sha-tachi ni tori, sonohi koso awaredearu.
77|35|Sore wa, hatsugen suru koto ga dekinai hideari,
77|36|mata mōshi-biraki mo, kare-ra ni yurusarenaidearou.
77|37|(Shinri o) usodearu to itte kita-sha-tachi ni tori, sonohi koso awaredearu.
77|38|Sore wa sabaki no hideari, ware wa anata gata mo (anata gata) izen no mono-tachi mo, issho ni atsumeru.
77|39|Anata gata ni nanika jussaku ga aru nonara, ware ni mukatte sakubō suruga ī.
77|40|(Shinri o) usodearu to itte kita-sha-tachi ni tori, sonohi koso awaredearu.
77|41|Omo o osoreru mono wa, hontōni (suzushī) kage to izumi no ma ni irudarou.
77|42|Kare-ra ga hossuru, subete no kajitsu (o eru).
77|43|`Kokoronosokokara manzoku shite tabe katsu nome, anata gata (no yoi) okonai o shita koto ni taishite.'(To ware wa iou. )
77|44|Kono yō ni ware wa, yoi okonai no mono-tachi ni mukuiru.
77|45|(Shinri o) usodearu to itte kita-sha-tachi ni tori, sonohi koso awaredearu.
77|46|(Anata gata fugi no mono yo. ) `Shibashi no ma tabe katsu kyōraku suruga ī. Hontōni anata gata wa tsumibukaimonodearu.'
77|47|(Shinri o) usodearu to itte kita-sha-tachi ni tori, sonohi koso awaredearu.
77|48|Kare-ra wa,`ritsurei 〔rukūu〕 seyo.' To iwa rete mo ryūrei shinai.
77|49|(Shinri o) usodearu to itte kita-sha-tachi ni tori, sonohi koso awaredearu.
77|50|Kono (kuruān) o sashioite, don'na oshie o kare-ra wa shinjiyou to suru no ka.
